name: Max HP Up
desc: Increase Max HP by 4% per level.

name: ATK Up
desc: Increase all damage by 6% per level.

name: SPD Up
desc: Increase movement speed by 6% per level.

name: Crit Up
desc: Increase critical hit chance by 2% per level.

name: Pick Up Range
desc: Increase base pick up range by 10% per level.

name: Haste Up
desc: Increase attack speed by 4% per level.

name: Regeneration
desc: Slowly heals 1 HP every 5 seconds. +1 HP per level.

name: Special Attack
desc: Unlocks the special attack for all characters. Press the secondary button (X) to use.

name: Special Cooldown Reduction
desc: Reduces the cooldown time of special attack by 3% per level.

name: EXP Gain Up
desc: Increases the amount of EXP gained by 4% per level.

name: Food Drops Up
desc: Increases the rate that food is dropped by 4% per level.

name: Money Gain Up
desc: Increases the amount of HoloCoins gained by 20% per level.

name: Reroll
desc: Grants a use of Reroll when leveling up.
